server.sharedRegions

Class CollectionSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.sharedRegions.CollectionSite

  • public class CollectionSite
extends java.lang.Object
    Shared Region with methods used by the Master Thief and the Ordinary Thieves. This class is responsible for gathering canvas and shaping the lifecycle of the Master Thief.
